item.title: How to use bayestraitr
item.description: I’ve been using BayesTraits for the last year or so, and had developed some packages to make it easy to create data for BayesTraits and to read in the output - which I’ve put into the R package bayestraitr. You can check out the code and some more examples on the github page Here I will walk through how to use it! Installing To install this package run this line:
